column5: Hi...Just wondering how the fishing is on Red Ceder Lake and area? I will be heading up there in a week. Thanks. Steve

I fished a nearby lake today.. A storm caught us off guard and we only caught one walleye. I've never fished Red Cedar but the lakes in that area have lots of structure and are  fun to fish. Good luck!

Red cedar is a pretty good fishery. I've fished it quite a few times. The walleye can be tricky to catch sometimes but it seems the smallies are always willing to bite. There are other lakes in the area that are pretty good too.
Remember to leave breadcrumbs so you can find your way back..
When are you up there.  I will be at Red Cedar Lake Camp on August 25.  You staying at the same camp or somewhere else.  I will have the blue Triton, stop by and say Hi.  Brian
